so_43214002: #!/bin/bash

filePath=$1
cat $filePath | awk '{print $2}' | uniq > /tmp/unique_ids
for i in `cat /tmp/unique_ids`;do shuf file.txt | grep "Hybrid: $i " | head -1;done;

ul_528343: max=6
for f in {1..100000}
do
    r=$RANDOM
    while [ $r -lt $((32768 % $max)) ]; do r=$RANDOM; done
    echo $(($r%max))
done | sort | uniq -c | sort -n
